content:
Matiari
Matyari or Matiari (Sindhi: مٽیاري‎, Urdu:  مٹیاری‎) town is located in midlands وچولو of Sindh. It is 30 kilometres north of Hyderabad on National Highway 5. Matiari is the District Headquarter of Matiari District, Sindh, Pakistan.
Matiari word is derived from two Sindhi words Mat and yari, which means friendship with earthen water pots. 
The Dargah of Pir Sayed sakhi Hashim Shah badshah is located in Matiari town.
Matiari has three talukas, they are Matiari, Bhitshah and Saeedabad respectively.
Matiari is known for its ice-Cream and Ajrak (a Sindhi dressing).
